text: The Woman I Love is a 1929 American silent drama film directed by George Melford and starring Margaret Morris, Robert Frazer and Leota Lorraine.Katchmer p.317 ==Cast== * Margaret Morris as Edna Reed * Robert Frazer as John Reed * Leota Lorraine as Lois Parker * Norman Kerry as Kenneth Hamilton * Bert Moorhouse as Lois' Boyfriend ==References== ==Bibliography== * George A. Katchmer. Eighty Silent Film Stars: Biographies and Filmographies of the Obscure to the Well Known. McFarland, 1991. ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:American films Category:Films directed by George Melford Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1929 drama films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: The Woman I Love (1929 film)
